OOC:  ok, that makes more sense. 


Shard couldn't remember having this muc=
h fun in a long time. Each time
one of those ships went down, he'd pause to=
 watch it explode into
flames as it hit the ground. Once in a while, a few =
would try to
attack him, sending him diving for cover.  

By the time the b=
attle was over, his black armor was covered in blast
marks and bullet holes=
, but he was still on his feet looking for
something more to shoot at.

May=
be now he could hook up with some Preds and kill some Maximals.
Spotting a =
bot that appeared to have either a Predacon or Decepticon
signature, Shard =
walked toward him.

"Hey!" he called, rocket launcher in hand, but not aime=
d, "Who are
you, and what the slag is going on here?"



OOC: either of you=
 can pick one of your Preds or Decepticons
